name: Typhon's Claws
flavorText: "We must reach out to bridge the gap between the known and the unknown. Only then can we unleash our true potential." -Chamal the Dainty
flavorTextHtml: "We must reach out to bridge the gap between the known and the unknown. Only then can we unleash our true potential." -Chamal the Dainty

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Double the duration of Hydras and increase the number of heads on multi-headed Hydras by two.(4) Set:     
 Damage taken is reduced by 8% for each Hydra head alive. Each time you take damage, a head dies. A head cannot die more than once every 2 seconds.(6) Set:     
 Hydras deal 2000% increased damage for each Hydra head alive.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Double the duration of Hydras and increase the number of heads on multi-headed Hydras by two.
(4) Set:
Damage taken is reduced by 8% for each Hydra head alive. Each time you take damage, a head dies. A head cannot die more than once every 2 seconds.
(6) Set:
Hydras deal 2000% increased damage for each Hydra head alive.
